alert.note: Alert for Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 3:46AM CDT until March 26 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 346 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dowdville, or near Prospect, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dixon around 350 AM CDT. Neshoba around 355 AM CDT. Philadelphia around 400 AM CDT. Bethsaida and House around 405 AM CDT. Forestdale around 415 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Tucker. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
